faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know before you start going viral.
faq.q1: Do I need to have ideas to use ViralBe.AI?
faq.a1: No! The big advantage is that you don't need any ideas. Just search your niche, find a video that is already viral, and we create a new and improved script for you.
faq.q2: Will the AI copy someone else's video?
faq.a2: Not at all. The AI uses the selected video only as inspiration to understand the structure and theme. The generated script is 100% original and ready for you to record in your own style.
faq.q3: Does it work for any niche?
faq.a3: Yes! From finance to gaming, from beauty to programming. If there is video content in your niche, our tool can find the viral ones and help you create your version.
faq.q4: How does the free trial work?
faq.a4: You get 3 free script generations, no credit card required. It's the best way for you to test and see the power of the tool in practice.
faq.a5: Yes. We offer a knowledge base with tutorials and examples, and Pro plan subscribers get priority support via chat and email for any questions.
